#[output application/json --- { correlationId: vars.headers.'X-correlation-id', sessionId: vars.headers.'X-session-id', applicationName: app.name, message: "Requesting database to get item details" }]

db:select.db:sql: SELECT orderID, placementDate, customerName FROM orderMaster where orderID = :orderId

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { orderId: payload[0].orderID as Number, placementDate: payload[0].placementDate, customerName: payload[0].customerName }

logger.message: #[output application/json --- { correlationId: vars.headers.'X-correlation-id', sessionId: vars.headers.'X-session-id', applicationName: app.name, message: "Details fetched from Database" }]
